Title: Relates to permitting the department of taxation and finance to share a person's address with the office of the state comptroller for the purpose of returning unclaimed funds
Summary: Provides that the department of taxation and finance shall be permitted to share with the office of the state comptroller a person's address, based on such person's most recently filed tax return, for the purpose of returning unclaimed funds to such person.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to permitting the department of taxation and finance to share a person's address with the office of the state comptroller for the purpose of returning unclaimed funds
